snippet.title: Zoochosis - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Zoochosis is a first-person psychological bodycam horror simulation game developed by Clapperheads. Players will embody a newly appointed night zookeeper tasked with ensuring the safety of the animals. Things spiral for the worst when an unknown parasite begins to infect the animals of the zoo transforming them into bloodthirsty mutants. Explore the zoo to make a cure in order to stunt the spread of the infection, or die trying. Zoochosis is coming to PC in Q2 2024.

Wishlist the game on Steam Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2458560/Zoochosis/
